slide.title: Images -> Pixmaps
slide.blurb: Sometimes it is necessary to make pixmaps/bitmaps out of the gdk-pixbuf images, since GDK only works with pixmaps. There are a couple of ways of doing this. One would be to create a GdkPixmap the size of the GdkPixbuf and then use render_to_drawable() method as we've done before. But there a convenience method that can be used.

The returned array will contain the pixmap and the mask for the image. $alpha_threshold specifies a value (0..255); the opacity of each pixel is compared to this value to determine whether the pixel will be transparent or not (bilevel only).
